data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nicolson, David, Csuzdi, Csaba (2018): Solving a nomenclatural conundrum: Cernosvitovia crainensis (Mršić, 1989) and Aporrectodea macvensis Šapkarev in Mršić, 1991 (Lumbricidae). Zootaxa 4496 (1): 156-159, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4496.1.10|2 occurrences
